name: YGO Permitted Memories
description:
Mouse controlls everything. Single clicks, Holding Clicks, Dragging Clicks.

Yu-Gi-Oh! Permitted Memories is a fan project to revitalize the Forbidden Memories gameplay with a newer Yu-Gi-Oh set of cards. Completely made from scratch, not a remake or remaster!

If you're playing this on Twitch or Youtube, PLEASE hit me up on Twitter! I would love to watch it :)
